meanings.sent1: I am foretasting the soup to make sure it is just right.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys foretasting the cake batter before baking it.
meanings.sent3: Foretasting the ice cream before it melts is a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Foretasting the excitement of the upcoming trip filled her with joy.
meanings.sent5: Foretasting the victory, he could almost taste success.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of tasting or experiencing beforehand.
meanings.sent1: The foretasting of the wine helped them decide on the perfect pairing.
meanings.sent2: His foretasting of the new video game left him eager to play.
meanings.sent3: The foretasting of the movie plot made her predict the ending.
meanings.sent4: The foretasting of the storm's power warned them to seek shelter.
meanings.sent5: The foretasting of the holiday festivities filled the air with anticipation.
